columns.name: create_timestamp
columns.description: The current timestamp when the application was created.

columns.name: last_update_timestamp
columns.description: The current timestamp when the application was last updated.

columns.name: runtime_environment
columns.description: The runtime environment for the application.

columns.name: service_execution_role
columns.description: Specifies the IAM role that the application uses to access external resources.

columns.name: application_configuration_description
columns.description: Provides details about the application's Java, SQL, or Scala code and starting parameters.

columns.name: cloud_watch_logging_option_descriptions
columns.description: Describes the application Amazon CloudWatch logging options.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The key-value tags assigned to the application.
